```{r echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(qsimulatR)
```

```{r}
x <- X(2) * qstate(nbits=2, basis=genComputationalBasis(2, collapse=">|"))
x
y <- H(2) * (H(1) * x)
y
z <- CNOT(c(1, 2)) * y
z
u <- H(1) * z
u
measure(u)
```
